channel.title: Elm on Typical personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Elm on Typical personal blog

item.title: Quick glimpse at world of Elm
item.description: Intro Recently I have came across a thing called Elm. It is a functional programming language dedicated to frontend. About language itself Functional language You will not have to worry about state mutations No runtime errors. I’ll just leave that here Friendly and helpful community. Go to slack, try talking - not only you will get your answers - but community will make you feel part of it Simplicity. You have this simple architecture emerging from language itself.
